metadata.Title: CVE-2022-41881 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Netty project is an event-driven asynchronous network applicationframework. In versions prior to 4.1.86.Final, a StackOverflowError can beraised when parsing a malformed crafted message due to an infiniterecursion. This issue is patched in version 4.1.86.Final. There is noworkaround, except using a custom HaProxyMessageDecoder.

criterions.comment: netty: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
netty-3.9: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
